message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy having it.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a deal, but I have to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy having it.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm still interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $102. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a fair price considering the value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, $102 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $99. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
